Name

composer generator - create code artifacts based on a business network definition

Synopsis

composer generator <subcommand>

Commands:
  create [options]  Create Code artifacts from Business Network Archive
  tests [options]   Generate unit tests

Options:
  --help         Show help  [boolean]
  -v, --version  Show version number  [boolean]

Description

This utility has a number of sub-commands that can be used to create code artifacts from a business network definition. As the business network definition contains a conceptual model of the business assets, participants and transactions it is possiblke to create a variety of difference code artifacts.

These include but are not limited to

  • JavaScript and Go language object definitions
  • UML Diagrams
  • Unit tests
  • Sample seed applications tailured to the business network

Commands

The sub-commands that are available are

  • create
    generate code artifacts
  • tests
    generate resources to permit testing of business network definitions

Options

  • --help
    Shows the help text
  • -v --version
    Shows the version number
